name: EXTINGUISH (TernaryGames)
description:
A puzzle game where you get *only one* glance at the level.

WASD to move
ESC to restart the room

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019

===========================================================

Game by Jenni Zimmerle

Title font: "Hi-NRG" by V. Sarela (Vautja) on Fontstruct.com
Used under Creative Commons license

Music: "Lightless Dawn" by Kevin Macleod on Incompitech.com
Used under Creative Commons license
